00042 #ifndef _AQUEDUCT_SHELL_H_
00043 #define _AQUEDUCT_SHELL_H_
00044 
00045 #define AQUEDUCT_SHELL
00046 
00047 #include "com.h"
00048 
00049 // Packet types
00050 #define AQSHELL_MESSAGE '#'
00051 #define AQSHELL_START '0'
00052 #define AQSHELL_NEWVERSION '1'
00053 #define AQSHELL_COMPLETEPAGE '2'
00054 #define AQSHELL_COMPLETEPROG '3'
00055 #define AQSHELL_CLEARSTATS '4'
00056 #define AQSHELL_STARTSTATS '5'
00057 #define AQSHELL_STOPSTATS '6'
00058 #define AQSHELL_SAVESTATS '7'
00059 #define AQSHELL_GETSTATS '8'
00060 #define AQSHELL_GETSTATS_REPLY '9'
00061 #define AQSHELL_SETVERSION 'A'
00062 #define AQSHELL_SETVERSION_REPLY 'B'
00063 #define AQSHELL_SUMMARY 'C'
00064 #define AQSHELL_PROFILE 'D'
00065 #define AQSHELL_REQUEST 'E'
00066 #define AQSHELL_DATA 'F'
00067 #define AQSHELL_GETID 'G'
00068 #define AQSHELL_GETID_REPLY 'H'
00069 #define AQSHELL_SUMMARY_SEND 'I'
00070 #define AQSHELL_PROFILE_SEND 'J'
00071 #define AQSHELL_REQUEST_SEND 'K'
00072 #define AQSHELL_DATA_SEND 'L'
00073 #define AQSHELL_CLOSE 'M'
00074 #define AQSHELL_SETLOG 'N'
00075 #define AQSHELL_NOOP 'O'
00076 #define AQSHELL_GETVERSION 'P'
00077 #define AQSHELL_SETIMAGESIZE 'Q'
00078 #define AQSHELL_SETCACHESIZE 'R'
00079 #define AQSHELL_ALLQUIET 'S'
00080 #define AQSHELL_NOTQUIET 'T'
00081 #define AQSHELL_HEARTBEAT 'U'
00082 #define AQSHELL_DEADNODE 'V'
00083 #define AQSHELL_STOPUPDATE 'W'
00084 #define AQSHELL_CACHEHIT 'X'
00085 #define AQSHELL_CACHEMISS 'Y'
00086 #define AQSHELL_CACHEHITFORWARD 'Z'
00087 #define AQSHELL_CACHEHITOLDFORWARD 'a'
00088 
00089 // Flags to tell how this packet should be handled
00090 #define AQSHELL_F_ACK 0x01                              // Acknowledging a command
00091 #define AQSHELL_F_PLEASEACK 0x02                // Receiver of command should ACK
00092 #define AQSHELL_F_RESEND 0x04                   // Unused
00093 #define AQSHELL_F_FORWARDREPLY 0x08             // XMOS shell should forward reply to Java server
00094 #define AQSHELL_F_SHELLCTL 0x10                 // Command intended for XMOS shell
00095 #define AQSHELL_F_NODECTL 0x20                  // Command intended for node, XMOS shell will forward
00096 
00097 struct aqshell_header {
00098         uint8_t command;
00099         uint8_t flags;
00100         uint16_t id;
00101         uint8_t seq;
00102         uint8_t length;
00103 } __attribute__ ((packed));
00104 
00105 #define AQSHELL_DATA_SIZE (COM_DATA_SIZE - sizeof(struct aqshell_header))
00106 
00107 struct aqshell_pkt {
00108         struct aqshell_header head;
00109         uint8_t data[AQSHELL_DATA_SIZE];
00110 } __attribute__ ((packed));
00111 
00112 
00113 #ifndef PLATFORM_LINUX
00114 
00115 #ifdef AQUEDUCT_SHELL
00116 
00117 void aqshell_init();
00118 void aqshell_send(uint8_t type, uint8_t* data, uint8_t len);
00119 
00120 #else
00121 
00122 // compile to nothing
00123 static inline void aqshell_init() {}
00124 static inline void aqshell_send(uint8_t type, uint8_t* data, uint8_t len) {}
00125 
00126 #endif /*AQUEDUCT_SHELL*/
00127 #endif /*PLATFORM_LINUX*/
00128 #endif /*_AQUEDUCT_SHELL_H_*/
